result.execSummary:
The defendant Dean Anton Spanel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Conditions of probation pay restitution to Lucinda Jiskra in the amount of $340 plus surcharges.  No Contact with Lucinda Jiskra. Pay costs/fines in the amount of $579.  Bond, $100, from case 15CM49 to be applied to restitution.   Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

judgments.dispoDesc: Def. pleads guilty to Ct# 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.   DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts  Court sentences defendant - sent. withheld - 1 year probation. Conditions of probation pay restitution. to Lucinda Jiskra in the amount of $340 plus surcharges.  No Contact with Lucinda Jiskra. Pay costs/fines in the amount of $579.  Bond, $100, from case 15CM49 to be applied to restitution.   Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

unpaid court obligations are converted to civil judgment
